actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to construct a shoreline protection project for the Atlantic Coast of New York City from Rockaway Inlet to Norton Point, New York.
short_title: Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor Act of 1985

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a project, at a specified cost, to provide shoreline protection for the Atlantic Coast of New York City from Rockaway Inlet to Norton Point.

titles.title: Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor Act of 1985
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to construct a shoreline protection project for the Atlantic Coast of New York City from Rockaway Inlet to Norton Point, New York.
